methods.name: _attachDom
methods.description: Auto append fbp for Polymer

methods.name: firstUpdated

methods.name: _FBPTriggerWire
methods.description: Triggers a wire

methods.name: _FBPTraceWires
methods.description:
Log all triggered wires for this component. This function may help you at debugging.
Select your element in the dev console and call `$0._FBPTraceWires()`

methods.name: _FBPDebug
methods.description:
Get information for the triggered wire. This function may help you at debugging.
Select your element in the dev console and call `$0._FBPDebug('--dataReceived')`

params.name: openDebugger
params.description: opens the debugger console, so you can inspect your component.

methods.name: _appendFBP
methods.description: parses the dom for flowbased programming tags

methods.name: _FBPReady
methods.description: flow is ready lifecycle method

methods.name: _pathGet
methods.description:
Reads a value from a path.  If any sub-property in the path is `undefined`,
this method returns `undefined` (will never throw.

params.name: root
params.description: Object from which to dereference path from

return.desc:
Value at path, or `undefined` if the path could not be
 fully dereferenced.

methods.name: _pathSet
methods.description:
Sets a value to a path.  If any sub-property in the path is `undefined`,
this method will no-op.

params.name: root
params.description: Object from which to dereference path from

return.desc: The normalized version of the input path

methods.name: _split
methods.description:
Splits a path into an array of property names. Accepts either arrays
of path parts or strings.

Example:

```
split(['foo.bar', 0, 'baz'])  // ['foo', 'bar', '0', 'baz']
split('foo.bar.0.baz')        // ['foo', 'bar', '0', 'baz']
```

elements.description:
Tab navigation for the open panels in a panel-coordinator.


```html
 <!-- inject the tabs from panelCoordinator and connect the keyboard navigation -->
 <furo-panel-coordinator-tabs ƒ-inject-tabs="--panelChanges" ƒ-trigger-navigation="--navpadPanelTabs" >
   <!-- add keyboard navigation -->
   <furo-navigation-pad @-navigated="--navpadPanelTabs"></furo-navigation-pad>
 </furo-panel-coordinator-tabs>
 <furo-pages flex default="default">
   <furo-panel-coordinator ƒ-show-page="--nodeSelected"  @-panels-changed="--panelChanges"></furo-panel-coordinator>
```

properties.name: focused
properties.description: indicates that the element is focused

of path parts or strings.

split(['foo.bar', 0, 'baz'])  // ['foo', 'bar', '0', 'baz']

methods.name: triggerNavigation
methods.description:
Connect your navigation pad.

Default mappings are:
- Enter => selectFocused
- ArroLeft => focusPrevious
- ArroRight => focusNext
- Home => focusFirst
- End => focusLast
- Escape => closeFocused

To disable a function, just add the `ignored-keys` to furo-navigation-tabs.

methods.name: closeFocused
methods.description: Closes the focused tab.

methods.name: focusNext
methods.description: Focuses the next tab. If you are on the last tab, the frist tab will be selected

methods.name: focusFirst
methods.description: Focuses the first tab.

methods.name: focusLast
methods.description: Focuses the last tab.

methods.name: selectFocused
methods.description: Select the focused tab.

methods.name: focusPrevious
methods.description: Focuses the previous tab.

methods.name: injectTabs
methods.description: Inject data from a navigationnode

methods.name: focus
methods.description: focuses the element itself. The "focused" tab will get the focus

elements.name: FuroPanelCoordinatorTabs

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description: indicates that the element is focused

methods.name: _updateItem
methods.description: re render, build search tokens

properties.name: _flatTree
properties.description: Flat list representation of the tree

properties.name: expandDepth
properties.description:
Sets the maximal expand level relative from the current node.

Expanding is a expensive operation.

properties.name: treeItemComponent
properties.description:
If you want to use a custom component for the tree-item, set this attribute.
The default item component is **furo-tree-item**.

properties.name: depth
properties.description: Maximal depth for the tree. Default is infinite.

properties.name: qp
properties.description:
Query param to watch. If you set this attribute, the node-selected event will only be fired on `ƒ-qp-in` or `ƒ-select-by-id`.
If you select an item the `qp-change-request` will be fired.

properties.name: rootAsHeader
properties.description: Set this flag if you do not want a header-text section.

properties.name: hideRootNode
properties.description: Set this flag if you do not want to see the root node

properties.name: headerText
properties.description: Override display name from root object

properties.name: _searchIsActive
properties.description: indicator for searching. Maybe you want style your item depending on this attribute

properties.name: nobgonhead
properties.description:
disables the background color on focus, selected, ... on header node

Works only with `root-as-header` enabled

properties.name: focused
properties.description: indicates that the element is focused

methods.name: collapseFocused
methods.description: collapses the focused element. If it is closed the parent will be focused.

methods.name: expandFocused
methods.description: expands the focused node, if it is opened the first child will be focused

methods.name: expandFocusedRecursive
methods.description: expands the focused node recursive

methods.name: collapseFocusedRecursive
methods.description: collapses the focused node recursive

methods.name: selectFocused
methods.description: selects the focused element.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Search in the visible nodes

methods.name: focusPrevious
methods.description: focus the previous item

methods.name: locationIn
methods.description: Inject a location object, which contains a query param property to select the current node.

methods.name: selectPrev
methods.description: select the previous visible item

methods.name: expandNodeRecursive
methods.description: expands the currently selected node recursive

methods.name: collapseNodeRecursive
methods.description: expands the currently selected node recursive

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: toggles the currently selected node

methods.name: selectNext
methods.description: select the next visible item

methods.name: focusFirst
methods.description: Focuses the first element

methods.name: focusLast
methods.description: Focuses the last element

methods.name: focusNext
methods.description: focuss the next item

methods.name: focus
methods.description: focuses the element

attributes.name: expand-depth
attributes.description:
Sets the maximal expand level relative from the current node.

Expanding is a expensive operation.

attributes.name: depth
attributes.description: Maximal depth for the tree. Default is infinite.

attributes.name: qp
attributes.description:
Query param to watch. If you set this attribute, the node-selected event will only be fired on `ƒ-qp-in` or `ƒ-select-by-id`.
If you select an item the `qp-change-request` will be fired.

attributes.name: root-as-header
attributes.description: Set this flag if you do not want a header-text section.

attributes.name: hide-root-node
attributes.description: Set this flag if you do not want to see the root node

attributes.name: header-text
attributes.description: Override display name from root object

attributes.name: nobgonhead
attributes.description:
disables the background color on focus, selected, ... on header node

Works only with `root-as-header` enabled

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description: indicates that the element is focused

events.name: node-closed
events.description:
node-closed
Fired when a node is closed

events.name: node-opened
events.description:
node-opened
Fired when a node is opened

events.name: node-selected
events.description:
node-selected
Fired when the item gets selected, does not fire when you work with query params
detail payload:

events.name: nodes-collapsed
events.description:
nodes-collapsed
Fired when nodes are collapsed recursive

events.name: nodes-expanded
events.description:
nodes-expanded
Fired when nodes are expanded recursive

events.name: qp-change-requested
